Name: MySQL - Create User If Not Exists
Description: Creates a new user account on a MySQL database server
Author: twerthi

Parameters.Name: createMySQLServerName
Parameters.Label: MySQL Server
Parameters.HelpText: Host name of the MySQL server

Parameters.Name: createMySQLServerPort
Parameters.Label: Port
Parameters.HelpText: Port number the MySQL server listens on.

Parameters.Name: createLoginWithAddUserRights
Parameters.Label: Login name
Parameters.HelpText: Login name of a user with rights to create user accounts.

Parameters.Name: createNewUsername
Parameters.Label: New user name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the new user account to create.

Parameters.Name: createNewUserPassword
Parameters.Label: New user password
Parameters.HelpText: Password for the new user account.

Parameters.Name: createUserHostname
Parameters.Label: New user host name
Parameters.HelpText: Host name that the new user account is allowed to login from.  Enter % to allow the account to connect from anywhere.

Parameters.Name: createUseSSL
Parameters.Label: Use SSL
Parameters.HelpText: Check this box to force the use of SSL.
